Description: A calcite drop pendant: with flattened front and back surfaces, still on its original cord which is formed from parti-coloured black and white fibre.
Curator's comments: Also from this burial: bracelet (1930,0711.106) and necklace or bracelet with pendant (1930,0711.105). Bibliography: G. Brunton, ‘Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture’ (London, 1937), 73; pl.XLIII, 31; Grave register, pl.XXXI; E. Massoulard, ‘Préhistoire et Protohistoire d’ Égypte’ (Paris, 1949), pl.XLVIII, 19.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (91)
